title: How Conference

**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018222111/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Conferences](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018222111/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Conferences) : How Conference**

The annual How Conference is typically hosted in a different US-based city each year. The How Conference is organized and hosted by the same people who publish [How Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018222111/http:/typophile.com/wiki/How%20Magazine).

2008 - Boston, Massachussetts; May 18 to 21
